snippet: A day after Vladimir V. Putin reclaimed the Russian presidency, thousands of antigovernment protesters massed in Moscow and international observers criticized the election.
abstract: Russian Prime Min Vladimir V Putin faces range of challenges to his legitimacy a day after claiming overwhelming victory in country's presidential election; international observers and a defiant opposition charge fraud, and thousands of protesters rally in Moscow. Photos (M)

byline.original: By ELLEN BARRY and MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ

lead_paragraph: A day after Vladimir V. Putin reclaimed the Russian presidency, thousands of antigovernment protesters massed in Moscow and international observers criticized the election.

headline.main: After Election, Putin Faces Challenges to Legitimacy
